value:
$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Good morning, Gunnthrá... *yawn*$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face|You're up rather early, little sister.
Did you have a bad dream?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Not bad just...strange.$k$pI was with you, Fjorm, and Hríd... It
was night, and we were in a forest
around a fire...$k$pAnd there was someone else there.
Someone I didn't recognize. They
were wearing a hood...$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face|Oh! Together around a campfire.
That sounds like fun. But who could
the mysterious stranger be?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|I don't know. They were watching us.
It wasn't scary, but it wasn't exactly
normal either.$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face|I wonder...do you have the same
power over dreams that I do?$k$pThat person... They might be
important to us sometime in the
future.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Do you think so? If I dream of them
again...I'll ask them!$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|Morning tidings, Gunnthrá...and Ylgr,
I see.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Hríd! Good morning! And you
too, Fjorm!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Now, this is strange. This early,
you're usually still asleep!$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|I need to speak with you, Gunnthrá. It
seems that our worries have become
reality, my sister.$k$pSurtr is coming, with the Fiery Hordes
of Múspell at his back.$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no! I had hoped that this was
nothing more than a silly fear of
mine... What will this mean for Nifl?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Does this mean there will be a
war, Hríd?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|You mustn't worry, Ylgr. We are
protected by Nifl, the dragon of ice.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|Our country is ringed by snowcapped
mountains. They have repelled
invaders for thousands of years.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Really? Then we have nothing to
worry about. Right?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|You must pray, Ylgr. Pray for the
people of Nifl. Pray for our family.
Pray for peace.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Of course! I'll do whatever you need
me to do. Tell me how I can help!$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face|I hope that this storm passes
harmlessly by... But I... I...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|Sister...$k$p
